title: American horror story coven - hank and Fiona argue while coredlia is blinded
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: Am I the only one who liked the intensity of how Fiona said "BULLSHIT" to Hank

"you're a loser" 
"you're one step up from the guys who stand in front of Home Depot" 
 omg I know Fiona is a confusing character but god she can be funny at times
The REAL savage in this scene is the nurse
"You can go on your own or my way, .... although I'd prefer the latter." I love how she delivered that line.

Damn this is what I call a bad day right here..get blinded by an unknown assailant and the man you love who says he loves you touches your hand to give you a little comfort and you get a montage of him screwing someone else. I'd be tempted to send him flying through the hospital window to the street below.
description:
American horror story coven - hank and Fiona argue while Cordelia is blinded/ Cordelia uses her second sight for the first time 
3x5 burn witch burn
